features: INTIMAL CARE FOR MEN:This intimate wash is specially formulated to provide extra protection for intimate skin. The pH-balanced formula is enriched with soothing chamomile extract, Sophora Flavescens extract and Stemona Japonica extract to keep your intimate area healthy and fresh all day long.

CLEAN AND FRESH: When you've had a hard day at work or an energetic workout, you want to relax your body quickly. This daily intimate wash is the ideal choice for you. Use it while bathing to get your intimate parts fresh, clean, non-greasy and back in shape.

EXCELLENT TECHNOLOGY: Our products are made of high quality materials and advanced technology. We have passed the certification of natural herbal ingredients, Dutch QC quality and safety certification.

NATURAL AND SAFE: These hygiene products for men are derived from natural herbal formulas and are professionally skin tested to prove that they contain no dyes, no alcohol, no harmful chemicals and no allergic factors. Every drop is responsible for your health.

NOTE: This intimate hygiene wash for men is used for daily cleaning of the intimate area. After washing hands and skin, squeeze out an appropriate amount of this product onto the skin, rub until lathered, and then rinse off with warm water. Note that this product is for external use only and should not be used internally.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars really good cleaned me up
reviews.reviewText: makes me feel so clean and fresh

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fancy packaging, average wash
reviews.reviewText: The wash itself is more average, a little too runny in my opinion. Does not foam the way it was expected to. The packaging is pretty impressive though, and it makes a cool gift if that’s what it is intended for..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Kind To The Boys
reviews.reviewText: It's a sensitive area and sometimes it feels nice to treat yourself with a bit of luxury in the places that matter most. Daresay this is one of those places. While formulated for down stairs it's good to use all over. Lathers nicely, cleaned very well, left no irritation at all. As mentioned this is a glass bottle and you need to be very careful using it in the shower. It made me a little nervous especially with children in the house. I do plan on keeping the bottle once empty for display because it's a very nice piece of artwork.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Netherlands product of high quality
reviews.reviewText: The Dutch have made this premium men's hygiene product.It comes with remarkable packaging that makes it a fabulous gift. It's quite sturdy and masculine looking. There's a subtle smell of coconut and chamomile. However, it does not have any soap, parabens, or artificial colors.You should use it every day to clean your private parts. Just lather it up and rinse it thoroughly with warm water. It is pH balanced and is unlikely to produce any type of allergic reaction. Although it is a bit expensive, you will not be using too much of it every day and it's safe to use on your manhood. I hope the photos are helpful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I never leave bad reviews, but dang. This product dried the Johnson out soooo bad. It does not lather and no smell. Had to treat my manhood with lots of skin repair lotion cuz giving myself pleasure became painful and it had to stop. I tossed this product directly after. Time to search again. :(

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This product looked promising and the the packaging was really nice but I was disappointed. The sent is nice but you can barely smell it and it doesn’t last very long and it doesn’t lather good especially with a wash cloth . I had to use about 10 pumps to lather enough to wash with so the bottle will be done really quick and the price is a bit too much in my opinion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells super good
reviews.reviewText: Smells super good. I did not feel anything wrong after few weeks of use. I did feel pretty clear after using it. It worth to try. Be good to yourself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Este producto. El aroma es demasiado fuerte como para ser íntimo.
reviews.reviewText: Debería de ser más suave más fea on aroma relajante no extremadamente fuerte.
